string.value: I heard there's a new girl at the Amoria Hair Salon that needs material for her new hair gel. I wonder what she'd offer in return?
I talked to Claudia, she needs #b25 Squishy Liquids#k for her new hair gel. She's offered to give me a free EXP Hair Salon coupon in return. She seems like a nice enough gal...
I got the Squishy Liquids for Claudia and she gave me an EXP Hair Salon coupon for her shop. I can use it once to get my hair done for free!

Hey there! My name's Claudia and I'm new around here. To help my clients' hair hold up a little better, I'm working on a new hair gel formula, called "Slick Slime". I'll need 25 Squishy Liquids though. Think you can help?
Ha-ha, good one! You know how to negotiate! Ok, I'm game. If you can get me #b25 Squishy Liquids#k, I'll grant you a free haircut. Hurry though; I have a long line of customers!
That's a shame. If you change your mind, pay me a visit!
Wonderful! My masterpiece of "Slick Slime" hair gel will at last be completed! So, as promised, here's your free EXP Hair coupon! See me when you're ready for your free haircut!
See me when you're ready for your free haircut!
I still need the #bSquishy Liquid#k, #b25#k to be exact; don't return until you've got them all! Next!
